SEARCH

Interface Device

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDevice, Mock.MockDevice
public interface Device
Represents a Device connected to a Motherboard that has Application(s) listening on port(s).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addApplication(int port, Application application)
    Add the given Application to this Device by having it listen on the given port.

    Return the unique identifier of this Device.

    Return the mapping of port to Application of this Device.

    • sendMessage

      boolean sendMessage(Message message)
      Sends a Message from this Device to another Device and Application. Returns whether this Message was successfully sent to another Device or Application.

      Returns:
      whether this Message was successfully sent

      Returns:
      whether this Message was successfully broadcast

    • addApplication

      boolean addApplication(int port, Application application)
      Add the given Application to this Device by having it listen on the given port. Return whether this Application was successfully added.
      Parameters:
      port - port to add the given Application to
      application - Application to add to this Device on a specific port
      Returns:
      whether this Application was successfully added

    • removeApplication

      boolean removeApplication(int port)
      Remove the Application listening on the given port number. Return whether an Application was removed from the given port number.
      Parameters:
      port - port to remove an Application from
      Returns:
      whether an Application was removed from this Device's port
